name: Clockwork Huntsman
movement: 40 ft. walk speed makes it agile
description: The Clockwork Huntsman is a mechanical construct with durable armor and a series of intricate parts that allow it to function effectively in combat. It uses nets to control opponents and boasts a powerful explosive core.
memorable: Its destructive explosive core provides a dramatic end and marks it as a formidable opponent on the battlefield.
goals: To serve as a guardian or enforcer, controlling the battlefield and obstructing enemies.
relations: Related to other constructs, potentially serving alongside clockwork creatures or guardians.
environment: Typically found in settings where constructs are used, such as dungeons or as guardians of important locations.
strengths: Immunity to various conditions, magic resistance, and the ability to control the battlefield make it a strong opponent.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence, wisdom, and charisma limit its strategic capabilities beyond programmed directives.
attacks: The Clockwork Huntsman can deliver powerful slam and longsword attacks, along with the ability to ensnare enemies using a net cannon.
most_powerful_ability: Explosive Core, which damages nearby creatures upon its destruction.
senses: Passive Perception at 14 allows it to perceive threats adequately, functioning effectively in its role.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Survival, with a +4 bonus in each.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Has an immutable form, immune to shape-altering effects.
Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
Can pull restrained creatures closer, maintaining battlefield control.
Has a net attack that can restrain Large or smaller targets.
test_queries: battlefield controlling construct with net attacks
tactical construct with powerful melee and ranged abilities
durable clockwork monster that ensnares enemies
explosive core guardian with magic resistance
